mapper.insert:
select member_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into member(member_no,member_id,member_pwd,member_name,member_nickname,member_tel,member_email,member_birth,address,addressdetail,postcode) values(#{member_No},#{member_Id},#{member_Pwd},#{member_Name},#{member_Nickname},#{member_Tel},#{member_Email},#{member_Birth},#{address},#{addressDetail},#{postcode})
